title: In last ten nights of Ramadan Imam doesn't pray witr after taraweeh, will I get full reward? assim
transcript: in the last 10 days of Ramadan here the IM doesn't play sorry he doesn't pray with after but I still love to go to the mid because I love to be among the women it makes me happy to see Muslim women together um can I still go for that reason only or am I sinful that I'm not going to get for that first of all if you pray with the IM without Twitter no one on earth says that you will not be rewarded everyone says you are rewarded but you will not be rewarded for praying the whole night because getting the reward of praying the whole night from the beginning till the end can only be attained if you prayed with the IM until he offers Witter and this is not applicable here because of the issue of you missing the prayer with uh the Imam he offered the wi in the but you will be rewarded for this little uh thing you have done and Allah Knows Best
